values:
anyone who knows me knows that my boss is a horrible, ridiculous inhuman monster.  in my coming posts i would like to dedicate some time to telling/reminding you why this is the case, lest history forget her atrocities.
 
 today's topic: my boss's todo list.
 classification: ridiculous
 
 it's not uncommon for my boss to storm into my office insisting that a new task she just invented out of thin air is suddenly "top priority" and must be done ASAP.  as a result, the paper in front of me that had previously listed my priorities from 1-10 often gets entries in the negative numbers as she makes her additions.  my coworkers and i have long wondered how it is possible for so many tasks to be of the utmost urgency simultaneously.  well, a few weeks ago we got a little insight.  she had left hastily for a meeting and we came upon her todo list for the day.  there were over 40 items.  each item was assigned a letter grade for its priority.  EVERY item on the list was either A or A+ priority.  what kind of insane troll logic is this?  how am i supposed to take her seriously when she gives me an "urgent" assignment?  well of course after we read that, phrases like "ASAP" and "top priority" lost all meaning.  it's just white noise.  it's too bad really, i had been working on a nice ulcer that's now going untended.
Please, I am posting against my will.  The clowns, oh the clowns are behind it.  Don't let them get you!
